author: smuzaffar
body:
This should fix the follow UBSAN runtime errors
https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/ubsan_logs/CMSSW_12_1_X_2021-10-01-2300/
```
961 L1Trigger/CSCTriggerPrimitives/src/CSCCathodeLCTProcessor.cc:619:46: runtime error: index -1 out of bounds for type 'unsigned int [225]'
961 L1Trigger/CSCTriggerPrimitives/src/CSCCathodeLCTProcessor.cc:646:46: runtime error: index -1 out of bounds for type 'unsigned int [225]' 
```
title: [UBSAN] CSCCathodeLCTProcessor.cc: Fix runtime error index -1 out of bound
